import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import apiBlogRequest from '../../../../api/blogApi' const BlogDetail = ({cateBlogs, blogs}) => { let {id} = useParams(); const [blog, setBlog] = useState({}) const showBlog = async () => { const {data} = await apiBlogRequest.get(id); setBlog(data); } useEffect( () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); showBlog(); },[]); return (

{blog.title}

{/*

travel - May 19, 2019

*/}
